name: Hyperloop - Jam Game
description:
All aboard the Hyperloop, a new generation of public transportation. What could possibly go wrong?

“Hyperloop” is a small 2D action platformer with handcrafted pixel art, an emphasis on mood, and a blasting original soundtrack made for the Ludum Dare #47 in three days a group of enthusiastic people. The game is rather short and a lot of ideas had to be scrapped to make the timeline. Balancing, as to be expected, is an issue as well. We intend to develop this further and release a post jam version as soon as possible.

If you particapted in Ludum Dare #47 as well, feel free to visit the ldpage and vote and comment there as well. We will return the favor!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/hyperloop-2

Have fun!

Controls

WASD + Mouse to run, aim and shoot
E / Enter to Interact
R / Right Mouse to Reload
Space to Jump
Shift to Run
